thread.title: Gigi Hadid Is Being Called Racist for a Video That Appears To Show Her Mocking Asian People
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid Is Being Called Racist for a Video That Appears To Show Her Mocking Asian People

title: Gigi Hadid Is Being Called Racist for a Video That Appears To Show Her Mocking Asian People
text: By Greg Seals February 6, 2017 Between her effortless style , her Maybelline contract , and her on-again, off-again, on-for-good romance with Zayn Malik , Gigi Hadid is used to making headlines. But a video posted posted over the weekend that appears to show the model mocking Asian people is drawing all the wrong kinds of chatter. It all began on Saturday, when Gigi's younger sister Bella posted a video of the 21-year-old out at dinner celebrating the birthday of a friend, according to Buzzfeed News . As the group sings happy birthday, the camera zooms in on Hadid as she holds what appears to be a Buddha cookie next to her face and tries to mimic the figures expression by aggressively squinting her eyes. Though Bella deleted the clip from her Instagram story, some were able to grab it before it disappeared. It began circulating on social media almost immediately. "[T]his is y'all woke palestine queen?" one user tweeted. "Gigi out here mocking Asian people. i would say she's cancelled but she never started." You May Also Like
